title: Sofia Richie looks sleek in a black blouse and trousers for a romantic dinner with Scott Disick
text:
They have been dating for over two years, despite their 15-year age difference.

And on Tuesday, Sofia Richie and Scott Disick enjoyed dinner at celebrity hot spot Nobu.

Sofia opted to dress up for the evening, while Scott sported a more relaxed, casual look.

Date night: On Tuesday, Sofia Richie, 21, and Scott Disick, 36, enjoyed dinner at celebrity hot spot Nobu

Sofia was styled in a long-sleeve, black blouse tucked into a pair of wide leg trousers.

The pretty blonde wore her hair down and textured. The reality star accessorized with a necklace and a small handbag.

Scott was dressed warmly in a cream sweater, khakis, and blue-and-white sneakers.

Sharp: Sofia was styled in a long-sleeve, black blouse tucked into a pair of wide leg trousers

The couple have been together since May 2017.

Prior to their relationship, Scott was with the mother of his children, Kourtney Kardashian. The duo dated on-and-off from 2006 until 2015.

Like Scott, Kourtney also dated a much-younger mate. She is back-on with her model Younes Bendjima, 26.

Casual: Scott was dressed warmly in a cream sweater, khakis, and blue-and-white sneakers

In a recent episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians, Sofia joined Scott and Kourtney on a family trip to Finland with their kids.

Sofia noted that Scott acts 'a lot more sophisticated...when Kourtney's around,' but that he turns 'into a five-year-old when it's just us.'

Scott later chatted with Kourtney, and came to the conclusion that he doesn't have to feel bad for wanting alone time with his girlfriend while on vacation with his children and his ex.
description: They have been dating for over two years, despite their 15-year age difference. And on Tuesday, Sofia Richie and Scott Disick enjoyed  dinner at celebrity hot spot Nobu.
